taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Asteraceae;tribe Cynareae;genus Cirsium;species edule;variety edule;

bio:treatment.discussion: Variety edule is known from the coast and coast ranges of Oregon and Washington. Some coastal populations of var. edule approach montane forms of var. macounii in stature, head size, and involucre pubescence. Some of the variation in var. edule may be a result of past introgression with Cirsium remotifolium. Populations of var. edule from within the ranges of C. remotifolium vars. odontolepis, remotifolium, and rivulare often show features of those taxa.
